page.title: 14The Area's Future
page.content:
**{Here's to the Future !}**
What of the future ? We live in a {National Park}and have lots of tourists - so we don't think the area is going to change very much.
We hope our school will still be here in 15 years time - the year 2000 - but our numbers are not very good. Perhaps we shall be in a large school with{St. {Hedda's}and{Grosmont}- we hope not, as we have so many traditions that go back to the year 1874.
We think that{Egton Show}will still be here and the village will remain unchanged.
{We really like living in the country !
